faq.title: Partner FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about becoming a Konty partner
faq.q1: How do I become a Konty partner?
faq.a1: Simply fill out the contact form on this page and our partnership team will reach out to you within 24 hours to discuss the opportunity and next steps.
faq.q2: What are the requirements to become a partner?
faq.a2: We look for partners with experience in retail or hospitality technology, a proven sales track record, and the ability to provide local support to clients in your region.
faq.a3: Partners receive comprehensive technical, commercial, and marketing support including training, documentation, co-branded materials, dedicated support lines, and ongoing product updates.
faq.q4: How does the delivery process work?
faq.a4: After signing the partnership agreement and completing training, you'll have access to our partner portal, demo systems, and sales materials. Our team supports you throughout the sales and implementation process.
faq.a5: We offer competitive partner pricing with volume-based incentives. Specific terms are discussed during the partnership evaluation process and tailored to your market and capabilities.
